title: Brain O'Clock
summary: Your brain – just like your body – needs exercise to be healthy and fit.
description: Your brain – just like your body – needs exercise to be healthy and fit. This math driven watch face can train your brain on an easy yet effective way: solving simple math expressions using the four standard mathematical operators to get the current time.Nowadays we are relying on smartphones, calculators, computers and other electronic devices which make our life easier, but at the same time your brain will be hungry for tasks. If you let your mind be lazy, it can lead to degradation of your mental abilities by time. Just give a chance to your mental fitness and use this simple and smart watch face time-to-time. Using it just even for a few days, can improve your skills. You will see. It`s time for a healthy brain training!You can configure 12 Hours / 24 Hours display and set the Difficulty level as well.We are open to any feedbacks and suggestions and hope you will find this watch face useful and effective.Supported devices: Android Wear 5.0 (or above) Smart Watches
descriptionHTML:
Your brain – just like your body – needs exercise to be healthy and fit. This math driven watch face can train your brain on an easy yet effective way: solving simple math expressions using the four standard mathematical operators to get the current time.

Nowadays we are relying on smartphones, calculators, computers and other electronic devices which make our life easier, but at the same time your brain will be hungry for tasks. If you let your mind be lazy, it can lead to degradation of your mental abilities by time.

Just give a chance to your mental fitness and use this simple and smart watch face time-to-time. Using it just even for a few days, can improve your skills. You will see. It`s time for a healthy brain training!

You can configure 12 Hours / 24 Hours display and set the Difficulty level as well.

We are open to any feedbacks and suggestions and hope you will find this watch face useful and effective.

Supported devices: Android Wear 5.0 (or above) Smart Watches
comments: Love it. Just awesome! I wish it worked on my NO.1 D6. Love the idea. Very good. But I don't know how it need be launched, or do it work on my watch. This is the best watch skin I ever seen. Very well done.
recentChanges: Watch Face Ambient Mode is fine-tuned
